title: Crust TV: Fabrica De Rosas Sunday
content:
Sunday was dirt church as the team got together to shoot the new Fabrica De Rosas x Crust Bikes jerseys. Give it a watch as they ride in Whittier, CA, and visit Samâ€™s beautiful ranch to meet his horses. Con much amor, gracias!
